synopsis.text:
Upon vanquishing their formidable enemy Naraku, Inuyasha and his companions savor a brief respite, allowing them to return to their individual lives. However, this tranquility is short-lived as an enigmatic figure emerges, introducing herself as Kaguya, the celestial Princess of Heaven. Coinciding with her appearance, the full moon inexplicably persists for several days, hinting at a sinister scheme to plunge the world into an endless lunar night.

Inuyasha, Kagome, Miroku, Sango, and Shippo must reunite to confront this new threat, whose control over time poses an unprecedented challenge. As they delve deeper into the mystery surrounding Kaguya's true identity and her connection to the defeated Naraku, they must also race against time to prevent the world from being frozen in eternal darkness. Will our heroes be able to thwart Kaguya's malevolent plans and restore peace once more, or will they succumb to this new menace looming over the warring country revolving around the Shikon no Tama? Join Inuyasha and his friends on this thrilling adventure to find out!
